discourse_list.title: A python script that calls lift and cast when there are enough votes

content.content: You will have to change/add some lines if you want to try this on the next executive vote. Read the comments in the file before trying to run this yourself.    GitHub    lixwhi/check_to_lift_and_cast checks the current number of votes. When there are enough votes it calls lift on the chief contract and cast on the slate - lixwhi/check_to_lift_and_cast      Comment below if you would like to try it on the next executive vote. Also, my programming skills are not the best, so any improvements to this are more than welcome!
content.GPT-summary: The author of the post is explaining a Python script that calls lift and cast when there are enough votes. The author invites feedback and collaboration on the script, and suggests that readers read the comments in the file before trying to run it.
GPT-discussion-categories: Author of proposal is explaining proposal
3rd party or author wants to collaborate on proposal

content.content: Thanks for sharing this lix, I’ve already seen a few people using it in chat!
